pages.text: A large number of redstone devices in this mod are simply unobtainable due to lacking any unique models, however they are free to use in creative as they are fully functional.$(br)The blockstates can be checked using the F3 menu.
A Redstone Clamp will limit the power of redstone coming in to it's clamp level.$(br)The clamp level can be raised with right click and lowered with shift right click.
A Redstone Filter will only allow signal through if it matches it's filter level exactly.$(br)The filter level can be raised with right click and lowered with shift right click.
A Redstone Hurdle will only allow a signal through if it is stronger than it's hurdle level.$(br)The hurdle level can be raised with right click and lowered with shift right click.

When a Redstone Static is powered it will emit a signal equal to it's static level.$(br)The strength of the incoming signal does not matter.$(br)The static level can be raised with right click and lowered with shift right click.
A Redstone Mono will release a 1 tick pulse when powered, and will not send another signal until unpowered. The pulse sent will be the same strength as the signal received.

A Redstone Random will send a random signal between 0 and the signal received.$(br)The strength will be randomized every time it is unpowered and repowered.$(br)It can be right clicked to toggle the minimum between 0 and 1.
